org.hibernate.shards.session
Interface ShardedSessionFactory

All Superinterfaces:
Referenceable, Serializable, org.hibernate.SessionFactory
All Known Subinterfaces:
ShardedSessionFactoryImplementor
All Known Implementing Classes:
ShardedSessionFactoryImpl, SubsetShardedSessionFactoryImpl
public interface ShardedSessionFactory
extends org.hibernate.SessionFactory

Shard-aware extension to SessionFactory. Similar to SessionFactory, ShardedSessionFactory is threadsafe.

Author:
maxr@google.com (Max Ross)

getSessionFactories

Returns:
All an unmodifiable list of the SessionFactory objects contained within.

getSessionFactory

ShardedSessionFactory getSessionFactory(List<ShardId> shardIds,
                                        ShardStrategyFactory shardStrategyFactory)
This method is provided to allow a client to work on a subset of shards or a specialized ShardStrategyFactory. By providing the desired shardIds, the client can limit operations to these shards. Alternatively, this method can be used to create a ShardedSessionFactory with different strategies that might be appropriate for a specific operation. The factory returned will not be stored as one of the factories that would be returned by a call to getSessionFactories.

Parameters:
shardIds -
shardStrategyFactory -
Returns:
specially configured ShardedSessionFactory
